query:
WITH item_prices AS (
            SELECT unit_price
            FROM suppliers
            JOIN shipments AS sh
                ON sh.supplier_id = suppliers.id WHERE sh.id = $1
            )
            UPDATE
                items
            SET
                status = 'in_stock',
                warehouse = 'W1',
                acc_cost = (SELECT unit_price FROM item_prices)
            WHERE id IN
            (
                SELECT items.id
                FROM items
                JOIN raw_material_shipments AS rs
                    ON rs.raw_material_id = items.id
                JOIN shipments AS s
                    ON rs.shipment_id = s.id
                WHERE s.id = $1
            )
